name: Rabid Rabbits
description:
Description

Rabid Rabbits - A competitive party style combat survival game.

Four opponents duke it out while striving to stay in the light. Achieve victory by boxing your enemies into the dark where the bunny monsters will attack.

The rabbits turn into monsters outside of the light to attack you. Launch your spring loaded boxing glove, but time it right because it leaves you vulnerable to counter-attack.

Keywords: spring, light, and monster

Team

For Science! 2012 - Steve Last, Resa Liputra, Ben Marrinan, Ash Muller, Michael Szewczyk, William Goddard

Fast Facts

Engine: Unity 3. Players: 4 Players. Playtime: ~5 minutes.
